name: LaBeouf Runner
description:
Game developed during Slavic Game Jam 2015.

Just do it!

Our hero is motivated to do some creative things. Hovewer, there are so many activities, which can distract him (TV, bed, WWW sites). Help him to avoid and overcome those things (for example by unplugging TV). Beware of wall which consists of avoided but not defeated desires.

Controls

Move using arrow keys.

Holding space holds your horizontal movements.

Hold S for brief invulnerability.
